original_text: So they did everything properly to serve the Lord that day. Everyone did what King Josiah had told them to do. They had the Passover meal and they offered the burnt offerings on the Lord's altar.
korean_text: 이와 같이 당일에 여호와를 섬길 일이 다 준비되매 요시야 왕의 명령대로 유월절을 지키며 번제를 여호와의 제단에 드렸으며

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 모든 것을 옳게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: to serve the Lord that day
Everyone did what King Josiah had told them to do
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 요시압 왕이 시킨 대로 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and they offered the burnt offerings
